description: This Python source file defines a route-based team of AI agents for multilingual question answering, including agent setup, team configuration, and a main execution block demonstrating usage.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with a specific role and model.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents configured for routing questions based on language.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: Model class for Claude AI model.

classes.name: DeepSeek
classes.description: Model class for DeepSeek AI model.

classes.name: MistralChat
classes.description: Model class for Mistral AI chat model.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for OpenAI chat models.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Method to print the response from the team based on a question.
